data.eml:eml: Resurrection of the genus Aphyllon for New World broomrapes (Orobanche s. l., Orobanchaceae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Schneider, Adam C. (2016): Resurrection of the genus Aphyllon for New World broomrapes (Orobanche s. l., Orobanchaceae). PhytoKeys 75: 107-118, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.75.10473, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.75.10473
